name: Happy Hour Cards (Set of 8)
description:
Invite your friends to a girls night out with these cards. The martini glass pattern sets the mood for a fun night out. These a perfect for a quick note to your girlfriends or invitations to a bachelorette party or just a fun evening.

	Set of 8 red 3.5×5 in. cards with a bold martini glass pattern printed on white linen cardstock. Blank on the inside. Set includes 8 white linen envelopes.

name: "Will you be my bridesmaid?" Cards (Set of 4)
description:
Ask your friends and family to be your bridesmaids in this special way. Each card is printed with two roses in shades of pink. The inside is blank for you to write a personal message. These cards will make wonderful keepsakes.

	Set of 4 soft pink 3.5×5 in. cards with a rose design printed on white linen paper. Set includes 4 white linen envelopes.

name: Custom Wedding Invitation Map and Directions
description: It’s the last step to complete your wedding invitation. Receive a custom and professional map made just for you. I just need your locations and the text you would like to include. Then your receive a pdf file that you can use as many times as you need. You can bring the file to any local printer or print from home. Available in color or black and white.

name: Custom Wedding Monogram
description: Set the theme for your wedding with a custom monogram! The monogram can be used for your invitations, programs, favors and more. You receive the electronic file (pdf, tif or jpeg, whichever format works best for you) and you can you use the file as many times as you like. Available in color or black and white.

name: Montage Save the Date File
description:
Save your date in style! Get a custom design to set your save the date cards apart from the rest. You’ll receive a high resolution electronic file (pdf, jpeg, tif, whichever works best for you) that you can upload and print anywhere you would like and as many times as you need.

	Please email 3-4 high resolution photos (no copyrighted images please) and the text you would like included to info@retrospectivedesign.com.

	In a few days, you’ll receive your proofs and then you can make any changes needed. This is a great way to get a custom look and stay in budget.
